text: 22.15: Ga 5.19-21; Fi 3.2; Kor 3.6; VB 21.8Mba feiŋ mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, mba kugi ga mbui gumgi gum, mba mbarkɨrga tori ga mbuav, ruarir gumgi gu mbigi wari kɨɨv, wari ndi gumgi gu mbigi gum, gumgi gu mbigi shogim, mbe vhɨzi gumgi gum, mba mbarɨvi gu tori rotu mbui gumgi gu bigi, guiguigi gumgi mba guiguigi tɨvi zɨn vui gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen ŋgu bakɨme vhen ŋgirgɨrga tuktɨgi fhu. Mbe anan ŋgun kɨrar kegɨrga.
